name: Gregory Stout 70 Backpack - Unisex
description: For those who prefer life off the grid. Challenging your next multi-day trek just got a little easier with this backpack. Adjustable and breathable, the carrying system is specifically engineered for trail use. Roomy internal compartments hold the essentials (and even a few luxuries) for your backcountry life. Need a snack but don't want to take your pack off? We've all been there...so this pack has trail-access side pockets for that very reason.  And if the weather isn't what you ordered, the integrated rain cover is ready to protect your load from an onslaught of precipitation.VersaFit suspension is light, adjustable and breathable.Adjustable shoulder harness lets you customize the pack to your torso length.Sternum strap slides up or down with an integrated whistle in the buckle.Access from top and bottom makes packing and unpacking quick and easy.Floating lid and spindrift collar accommodates different size loads.Stretch mesh expanding shove-it pocket fits a shell jacket and secures with single buckle.Each side has a trail access stretch pocket and 2 compression straps.2 zippered hipbelt pockets keep small personal items handy.Bottom compression straps reduce volume or hold extra gear.Shock cord and tool loops let you attached poles or tools.Integrated rain cover is removable and stows in a zippered pocket.Interior Nano connect toggles let you attach a Nano 14 daypack (sold separately).Maximum recommended load: 23kg.
